description:
1) The "storwize_svc_vol_vtype" option must be set to "striped", as "seq" requires additional parameters to be passed to the mkvdisk command.
2) The "storwize_svc_vol_warning" option is ignored when creating volumes.
3) Easy Tier is not supported by the driver.
title: Multiple errors in Storwize/SVC driver options

comments.content:
1) The "storwize_svc_vol_vtype" option must be set to "striped", as "seq" requires additional parameters to be passed to the mkvdisk command.
2) The "storwize_svc_vol_warning" option is ignored when creating volumes.
3) Easy Tier is not supported by the driver.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~avishay-il

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/12779
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/cinder/commit/190c49e1381cc39160ced743cb11e140c9be4825
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 190c49e1381cc39160ced743cb11e140c9be4825
Author: Avishay Traeger <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Sep 11 13:31:01 2012 +0300

    Fixes bug 1049446.
    
    Removed the "vtype" option which did not work in the driver, and
    added the "easytier" option. Added another check to _check_flags
    and made sure -warning flag is passed properly. Added unit tests
    to check all option variations.
    
    Change-Id: I4e66436f8f62d851a079ec80209fe9d6b27fb5b4
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

commit 504514d294cd573bfebe4b86bc2d38b9302469ee
Author: Avishay Traeger <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Sep 13 09:23:40 2012 +0300

    Fix config opts for Storwize/SVC volume driver.
    
    Removed the "vtype" option which did not work in the driver, and
    added the "easytier" option. Added another check to _check_flags
    and made sure -warning flag is passed properly. Added unit tests
    to check all option variations.
    
    Fixes bug 1049446.
    
    Change-Id: I135ed85ad1b9d60e6a8cc406aa49360e0f080039
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
